# textLayoutManager

**Instance Property**

The text layout manager for this view.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var textLayoutManager: NSTextLayoutManager? { get }
```

## Discussion

Specify the value of this property at initialization time using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextAttachmentViewProvider/init(textAttachment:parentView:textLayoutManager:location:)] initializer.

## Defining the contents

- **location**: The location that indicates the start of the text attachment.
- **textAttachment**: The text attachment for this view.
- **tracksTextAttachmentViewBounds**: A Boolean value that determines the text attachment’s bounds policy.
- **view**: The text attachment’s view.
